ITEM: Green Shell              KEY: D-PAD Down
ITEM: Red Shell                 KEY: D-PAD Right
ITEM: Mushroom x3           KEY: D-PAD Left
ITEM: Blue Shell                KEY: +
ITEM: Mega Mushroom       KEY: -
ITEM: Bullet Bill                 KEY: Home
ITEM: ThunderCloud           KEY: 2
ITEM: POW Block             KEY: 1
ITEM: Banana                   KEY: C + 2
ITEM: Fake Item Box         KEY: C + 1
ITEM: Mushroom               KEY: Z + D-PAD Up
ITEM: Bob-omb                 KEY: Z + D-PAD Down
ITEM: Lightning                 KEY: C + D-PAD Left
ITEM: Golden Mushroom   KEY: C + D-PAD Right
ITEM: Blooper                   KEY: C + D-PAD Down
ITEM: Green shell x3         KEY: Z + D-PAD Left
ITEM: Red Shell x3            KEY: Z + D-PAD Right
ITEM: Banana x3               KEY: C + Z
ITEM: None                       KEY: C + B
*Works online/offline P1 Only
*to use 2 players see
*code below

Moon Jump (B)

E0000000 80008000
28341462 00000000
045AA70C D33E006C
E0000000 80008000
Change 1st line to 28343e80 00000280 and 9th line to 28343e80 00000080 for GCN Controller

No Countdown

Drive Underwater
0488D28C 42000000

360 Turning Bullet Bill
048B29D4 30000000
048B29DC 30000000
025B24F2 00000000
(Recommended that you use better steering bullet bill with this code)

Better Steering Bullet Bill
048B2A0C BD600000
(Recommended to use with 360 turning bullet bill code change the value to your liking default-bc23d70a)

Change Physical water line (peach beach) (3f8 default)
048A6AE8 CFF00000
